root.name: Virtual Pool 3
root.description: 21 variations of pool are included in this game: Snooker Nine-ball Straight pool Eight-ball – league Eight-ball – pub Eight-ball – midwest Eight-ball – bar Ten-ball Six-Ball Three-ball One-pocket Rotation Bank pool Honolulu Cowboy pool Bowliards Cribbage pool Fifteen ball Basic pocket billiards Cushion caroms (one-cushion carom billiards)Three-cushion billiards
